trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Whittier
There were no other sightings in Whittier on or around March 8th 2012
Summary: Saw a black spect in picture. Zoomed up and looks like saucer.
divs: Sighting DetailsHello, while taking random pictures of sunset. I found a black spect at nine o'clock, at the sun's corona, near edge. It wasn't right away that I noticed this anomally. Not untill months latter. I was zooming up pictures and studying the sun and noticed the small saucer like object. It is too well defined to be confused with a plane or bird. I also don't think it is a ballon. So I sent it to mufon for your viewing. G.A.
